plot: Kitarou, a ghost, spends his afterlife helping humans in need of his skills. He thwarts the plans of evil spirits who live to torment humanity.
opening_theme: "Gegege no Kitarō" (ゲゲゲの鬼太郎) by Kazuo Kumakura
"Hakaba no Kitarō (墓場の鬼太郎)" by Kazuo Kumakura
ending_theme: "Karan Koron no Uta" (カランコロンの歌) by Midori Katō
"Kitaro Nai Nai Ontou" by Kazuo Kumakura
"Kitarō Nainai Ondo" (鬼太郎ナイナイ音頭) by Kazuo Kumakura (eps 27-28, 31-32)
"Kitarō Olympics" (鬼太郎オリンピック) by Kazuo Kumakura (eps 41-43)
